project1.title: Temperature Converter
project1.description: This app converts temperatures in Fahrenheit to Celsius, or will convert temperatures in Celsius to Fahrenheit
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
